title: PBE Website Bug
body:
So I recently got accepted into the PBE. After making my account, I tried going onto the PBE website. 
it says: Unable to retrieve discussions.
What should I do?

replies.body:
Okay, That was simple All i did was close out all my tabs and re-opened Google Chrome and it worked!
Thanks for the help!
Yes It's still happening, I guess it's on my side then i'll try some things out to try to fix it! :D

Hey Insanefully,

Thanks for the report! I'm able to get discussions on the boards. Is this still occurring for you?
